description: A male student at Seika High School who initially dislikes Misaki because of her forceful methods of reforming Seika. He and his friends discover that she works at a maid caf√© early on in the story, but after he is defended by Usui, they quickly become her biggest fans, as well as regulars at Cafe Maid Latte, often referred to as the "idiot trio". His nickname is "Shiroyan". He also used to be a delinquent in middle school known as White Demon.
name: Shirokawa Naoya
